reviews.review: Отличное продолжение Half LIfe 2 с легкими достижениями)
Muy buena y es la continuación ,recomendada :D

Como no recomendar este juego, si me juge toda la saga y hasta el día de hoy jamas me cruce con un juego la que la superara, cada tantos años la vuelvo a instalar para volver a jugarla completa, como estoy haciendo justamente ahora, No me voy a cansar.

Продолжение классики не требует особых коментариев,единственное,что очень мало игрового времени,думаю лучше было объединить первый и второй эпизоды вместе и выпустить как полноценную часть,а так надеемся на продолжение и бесконечно ждем 3 часть,а пока пройду второй эпизод)А,ну и естественно советую,каждый должен сыграть в этот шедевр того времени.
I beated Half-Life 2: Episode One in 3 hours. The game was good. 8/10
最真实的物理引擎，最极致的细节，最具有想象的剧情，和永远都不会数三的g胖。
офигенная часть халфы, но также и самая короткая. прошёл полностью за 1 раз. а так топчик, на очереди 2 эпизод

Лучший эпизод, и намного лучше по динамике чем вторая часть халфы, но оч короткий
В своё время намучился со страйдером в конце
В принципе игру можно пройти меньше чем за час и вернуть деньги за игру если тупо бежать на пролом. Так что спидранерам повезло если проходите игру на время.

More Half-Life 2... Episode 1 is VERY SHORT! However, It is fun ONCE YOU GET PASSED THAT MF ELEVATOR SECTION. I swear man, I must have been on the elevator part for 20 minutes, since I would hit the huge pieces debris and it would still hit the elevator which is an insta kill, APPARENTLY you are supposed to hit them twice? and it dissolves, but I got through it without doing that I guess? Weird stuff. Everything past that point was fun though. 

Overall 7/10
I hate striders (but is good game)

dude this is like a childhood game for me. the first time i ever saw this game was when i saw my father play this on his 2007 hardcore gaming machine back then. i asked him "hey dad, that game looks so cool. can i try it?". he went "yeah sure" and i was playing for a while. since then i loved that game. i always asked my dad to turn on the pc everytime because my mom would get mad at me when i was the one logging into the pc. this game is genius and elite. its hard to figure out where you have to go because its like an open world game, but also not. but its a really good expierience to play it, no matter how often i replay this
Good follow up. Wish it was longer tough!

The Pitch Black Area infested with Zombies is Very annoying, especially since the Flashlight uses the Same energy Source as your Stamina, but Other than that The Game is very fun and the Escort Mission at the End was saved for me since they put a Crate of Infinite Rockets there.

Half-Life 2 serisinin 2.oyunu.Birçok kişi sıkıcı geçti demiş ama ben gayet eğlendim.Tavsiye ederim.

(Joguei pelo MMod) É curto, mas mostra o resultado da explosão e estabelece a base pra sua sequência. Tem ótimas ideias mas engaja de verdade na metade, com uma das melhores fases e músicas do jogo. Alyx tem expressões impressionam até hoje (assim como as de outros NPCs principais do jogo) e contrasta muito bem com o silêncio de Gordon. Ela é uma das melhores companions dos jogos.

Sobre o MMod: Além dos gráficos, ele melhora principalmente o gunplay e adicona mais armas. Balanceando as configurações entre fidelidade e novidade, é possível alcançar uma experiência fiel e modernizada ao mesmo tempo. Recomendo!
Pretty short but still can't complain about Half-Life content at this price. Tons of fun. The ending was irritating as it was hard to dodge the bullets.
Still holds up pretty good, seems very meticulously designed around the one bullet achievement, which is the optimal way to play it.  A little short, and the 2nd episode is better.
Half-Life 2 hikayesinin devamı. Bu bölümde kısacası kontrolden çıkan Citadel sebebiyle City 17'nin dışına kaçmaya çalışıyoruz. Yine aksiyonun bol olduğu bir devam bölümü.
good but the final level is kinda ass
Отличная игра. Габен давай уже HL3(.
meehh possibly worst half life game still good tho

10/10

Very addicting story, challenging game play, and is kinda terrifying.
acho que é uma continuação muito pequena
Fantastic game. Good game-play, good movement, and great story.

Krótki epizod bo zaledwie 5 pełnych rozdziałów, ale moim zdaniem nic dodać nic ująć. Wątek został wyczerpany.
Every gamer should have played this game.
Episodio 1 del juego culiao hermoso bastante corto pero igual de disfrutable :)

Il buon caro vecchio Half Life 2 ritorna in una breve espansione (6 ore ca. a difficoltà massima) che ci porta, affiancati da Alyx, a dover fuggire da City 17, riallacciandoci alla storyline interrotta alla fine del capitolo principale.

Viene ripreso HL2 in tutto e per tutto: gameplay, ambientazione, meccaniche, nulla da ridire a riguardo; l'unico vero difetto a mio avviso è proprio la presenza costante di Alyx, che in certi frangenti semplifica un po' troppo le cose. Comprendo che il gioco sia stato concepito in questo modo ma avrei preferito affrontare in solo sezioni più ampie.

Ad ogni modo esperienza consigliata! Ed ora, spinto dalla curiosità, vado subito a recuperare anche Episode Two :D
Битва со страйдером. Тупо анальная дрочка подругому не скажешь.

[h1] Un nuevo episodio y una vuelta temporal a la trama [/h1]
Este episodio es el comienzo de un grupo de capítulos que suceden a la historia de Half-Life 2. Llegado este momento la historia se vuelve intrigante ya que como Gordon Freeman viviremos las consecuencias de lo ocurrido en la Ciudadela, y por consiguiente, en Ciudad 17. El argumento del poder que tenían ciertos personajes conocidos de la trama se maneja muy bien y te deja asombrado con solo empezar, además se presentan nuevos enemigos. La banda sonora claramente presenta una mejora con respecto al anterior título, siento que es el punto fuerte de estos episodios. Si bien este es un título corto, no te arrepentirás con el final, ya que aquí se desarrolla una de las mejores batallas tipo uno contra uno que ha tenido Gordon en toda la saga.
necesariamente para poder entender toda la historia !!

É Half Life, logo é bom. Acontece literalmente onde se encerra o antecessor. Gordon, Alyx e Barney precisam fugir da Cidade 17 antes do colapso, tentando salvar alguns civis no caminho. Bem legal. Empolgante. Fácil e divertido de platinar.
Its short and i ngl forgot what happend
the ending is pretty good in my opinion even if it has a similar hospital to no mercy its good and i recommend this product

not as good as hl2 but pretty good 
i liked the part where dog looked at me

Este es un Juegazo, aunque me sigue pareciendo mejor el Half Life 2 original, ya que este es un poco corto y se vuelve algo aburrido. La verdad que lo compre para ver que pasaba despues del final de Half Life 2, pero pues no ocurrio nada interezante, para mi desgracia nadie murio en esta entrega, pense que quiza no se alyx moria tras la explocion, o brink revivia yo que se... pero esta bueno, y creo que lo vine a probar un poco tarde jeje, ya saben 10 años despues jeje....7/10
